attributes.additional_details: All LGBTQIA+ deserve to live free from abuse. “Conversion therapy” is abuse and a “religious” loophole would leave some queer and genderqueer people unprotected. No one should be forced to undergo “treatment” to “correct” their sexuality or gender identity.
attributes.background:
Implement a total ban of LGBTQIA+ “conversion therapy”
No “religious” loophole, protect ALL queer and genderqueer people
Ban all forms of “conversion therapy”, from organised camps to parents telling children to “pray the gay away”

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596485
